title: Space Exploration Music Pack - Volume 1
description: A pack of 9 themes, loops and variations of SPACE-themed audio delights!
longDescription:
Perfect for anything requiring a SPACE feel, a mixture of both upbeat and gentle tracks suitable for many uses. Featuring spacious synths and gentle orchestral tones, this pack is perfect for anything from mellow scenes to full space exploration. Each theme comes with a loopable version and a stripped back loop for adaptable experimentation and variation...


*** This pack is also included in the Mighty MUSIC MEGA PACK - Volume 1 along with eleven other albums and assorted goodies at an amazing discounted price. Click HERE to check it out! ***


Please feel free to let me know about your project if it features my music so I can share and promote your game.


The Space Music Pack - Volume 1 by Ethan Lewis Maltby is a varied selection of Space inspired themes. With plenty of epic scale but some intimate beauty as well, each two minute plus theme can be used in-game or as menu music. There are loopable versions of each theme as well as stripped back versions suitable for in-game action; mix and match each loop to create your own unique soundtrack!


SPACE MUSIC PACK - Overview


- NINE main full tracks of varied themes: LISTEN HERE

- NINE tracks of stripped back versions of each theme which can be used for creating an adaptive score or just mix and match them within your game. LISTEN HERE


MAIN THEMES [each comes with a loopable version + stripped back variation]

1 - Exploration, Moderate, Orchestral - [02:35]

2 - Gentle Awe, Slow, Synthetic - [02:18]

3 - Spacious Beauty, Slow, Synthetic - [02:21]

4 - Discovery, Pulsing, Tense - [02:49]

5 - Pioneering, Beautiful, Slow - [02:07]

6 - Danger, Dark, Tense - [02:22]

7 - Drifting, Gentle, Dark - [02:23]

8 - Epic Discovery, Building, Grandiose - [02:38]

9 - Pulsing, Intense, Epic - [02:14]

Total: 21:51
technicalDetails:
Features:

- Fully Mastered themes ready for import - 21 :51 Minutes

- Loopable versions of the main themes s for in-game flexibility - 20 Minutes

- Loopable stripped back versions of the themes for no hassle in-game adaptive use - 20 Minutes

- Professional Quality wav files, 16bit/44.1khz

- Composed and Produced by a musician with two decades of professional experience in Film, TV, Sporting Events and Theatre.


Number of Audio Wavs: 27

Number of Audio Cues: 27

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1khz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 63

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Additional Notes:
